languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, я вас поблагодарить хотела за то, что не бросили меня у безумного гемункула того. И простите, если наговорила вам там всякого лишнего. Я... слегка не в себе была. Вы просто не представляете, каково это было — наконец-то оказаться наедине со своими собственными мыслями. Очень сложно было от такого отказаться и поверить в то, что это очередная ловушка ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, я вас поблагодарить хотела за то, что не бросили меня у безумного гемункула того". {n}Идира рассеяно сковыривает пару болячек на лбу и висках, куда еще недавно были воткнуты трубки пси-дампера.{/n} "И простите, если наговорила вам там всякого лишнего. Я... слегка не в себе была".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я вас поблагодарить хотела за то, что не бросили меня у безумного гемункула того. И простите, если наговорила вам там всякого лишнего. Я... слегка не в себе была. Вы просто не представляете, каково это было — наконец-то оказаться наедине со своими собственными мыслями. Очень сложно было от такого отказаться и поверить в то, что это очередная ловушка ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."

You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."

You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，我很高兴你没有把我丢在那个可怕的血伶人手里。如果我那个时候说了一大堆不该说的话，我很抱歉。我那个时候……脑子已经完全乱套了。那些声音终于消失了，我终于可以独自一人思考了，你可能不太了解那样的感觉。要我放弃这一切，相信这不过是异形设置的陷阱，这对我来说并不太容易。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我很高兴你没有把我丢在那个可怕的血伶人手里。如果我那个时候说了一大堆不该说的话，我很抱歉。我那个时候……脑子已经完全乱套了。那些声音终于消失了，我终于可以独自一人思考了，你可能不太了解那样的感觉。要我放弃这一切，相信这不过是异形设置的陷阱，这对我来说并不太容易。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, quería darle las gracias por no abandonarme con ese Hemónculo demente. Y lo siento si dije cosas que no debería. Estaba... bastante perjudicada. No sabe lo que es estar por fin a solas con mis propios pensamientos. No fue fácil rechazarlo y creer que realmente era otra trampa de los xenos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, quería darle las gracias por no abandonarme con ese Hemónculo demente. Y lo siento si dije cosas que no debería. Estaba... bastante perjudicada. No sabe lo que es estar por fin a solas con mis propios pensamientos. No fue fácil rechazarlo y creer que realmente era otra trampa de los xenos».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich wollte mich bedanken, dass Ihr mich nicht bei diesem kranken Haemonculus gelassen habt. Und es tut mir leid, falls ich Dinge gesagt habe, die ich nicht hätte sagen sollen. Ich war ... ziemlich durcheinander. Ihr wisst einfach nicht, wie das ist, wenn man endlich mit seinen eigenen Gedanken allein ist. Es war nicht leicht, das aufzugeben und zu akzeptieren, dass es nur wieder eine Falle eines Xenos war."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich wollte mich bedanken, dass Ihr mich nicht bei diesem kranken Haemonculus gelassen habt. Und es tut mir leid, falls ich Dinge gesagt habe, die ich nicht hätte sagen sollen. Ich war ... ziemlich durcheinander. Ihr wisst einfach nicht, wie das ist, wenn man endlich mit seinen eigenen Gedanken allein ist. Es war nicht leicht, das aufzugeben und zu akzeptieren, dass es nur wieder eine Falle eines Xenos war."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン。あの気持ち悪いハモンキュラスにあたいを託さないでくれてありがとう。余計なことを言ったなら謝るわ。あたいは…かなりおかしくなっていた。ようやく独りきりで考え事ができた時のあたいの気持ちは分からないでしょうね。そうすることを諦めるのも、これが異種族の仕掛けた罠だと思うのも簡単じゃなかったわ」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン。あの気持ち悪いハモンキュラスにあたいを託さないでくれてありがとう。余計なことを言ったなら謝るわ。あたいは…かなりおかしくなっていた。ようやく独りきりで考え事ができた時のあたいの気持ちは分からないでしょうね。そうすることを諦めるのも、これが異種族の仕掛けた罠だと思うのも簡単じゃなかったわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je tiens à vous remercier de ne pas m'avoir abandonnée avec ce monstrueux hémoncule, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et je m'excuse d'avoir dit un tas de choses inappropriées. Je n'étais pas... dans mon état normal. Vous n'imaginez pas ce que c'est qu'être enfin seule avec ses propres pensées. Cela n'a pas été facile d'accepter que ce n'était qu'un nouveau piège xénos. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."

traits.locale_text: « Je tiens à vous remercier de ne pas m'avoir abandonnée avec ce monstrueux hémoncule, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et je m'excuse d'avoir dit un tas de choses inappropriées. Je n'étais pas... dans mon état normal. Vous n'imaginez pas ce que c'est qu'être enfin seule avec ses propres pensées. Cela n'a pas été facile d'accepter que ce n'était qu'un nouveau piège xénos. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, beni o hasta Haimonkulus'la tek başıma bırakmadığın için sana teşekkür etmek istedim. Ayrıca söylememem gereken şeyler söylediğim için de özür dilerim. Pek kendimde değildim. Uzun zaman sonra kendi düşüncelerinle baş başa kalmanın ne demek olduğunu bilmiyorsun. Bunun bir zeno tuzağı olduğuna aldanmamak kolay değildi."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I wanted to thank you for not leaving me with that sick Haemonculus. And I'm sorry if I said a bunch of things I shouldn't have said. I was... pretty out of it. You just don't know what it's like to finally be alone with your own thoughts. It wasn't easy to give that up and believe it was just another trap set by a xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, beni o hasta Haimonkulus'la tek başıma bırakmadığın için sana teşekkür etmek istedim. Ayrıca söylememem gereken şeyler söylediğim için de özür dilerim. Pek kendimde değildim. Uzun zaman sonra kendi düşüncelerinle baş başa kalmanın ne demek olduğunu bilmiyorsun. Bunu bir kenara bırakmak kolay değildi ve bence zenolar tarafından kurulmuş bir tuzaktı."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
